description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of "SmadHook.dll", a DLL used by SmadAV antivirus
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential SmadHook.DLL Sideloading
query: (dll.path:(/.*\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Oo][Kk]32[Cc]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Oo][Kk]64[Cc]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) AND (NOT (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND dll.path:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Mm][Aa][Dd][Aa][Vv]\\\\.*/))))
